caseTitle: Raja Ghous Bux Bijarani v. Sardar Ghulam Abid Khan & others
tagline: Non-verified votes cannot be declared to be bogus and excluded from the count altogether so as to hold that the election result was procured by the respondent through illegal and corrupt practices or that there has been noncompliance of the provisions of the Representation of People Act, 1976 or the Rules made thereunder, thereby bringing the case within the purview of Section 70(a) or even (b) of the Act.
